::Savanna::

she followed Kluster off the bridge.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster looks up at the two other bots as they enter. He is about 
to answer 
> when the scanners beep.
> 
> "Bot aproaching."
> 
> Kluster points to a screen, displaying the exterior of the 
ship. "That," he 
> says, looking at the strange centaur creature.
> 
> "Come with me, let's check it out," he says, walking out of the 
bridge.
